meaningMnemonic: The kanji and the word are exactly the same. That means they share meanings as well.
readingMnemonic: If anyone ever tries to touch your <kanji>belly</kanji> make sure you yell "Seku<reading>hara</reading> (はら)! Sekuhara!” Sekuhara is short for sexual harassment in Japan. And if you don't want someone to touch your belly, but they're trying to, then that's sekuhara!
